comment._content: Not much has changed in 110 years! Loving this series of Welsh landscapes. It is so interesting seeing how my world looked so long ago.

comment.author: 40134891@N02
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Old photos of Pembrokeshire, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
